featured.text: Higher ocean temperatures kill the important food source for the coral—the algae, the tiny greenish-gold water plants that live on coral.

definition.zh_def: 溫度是物體或環境的熱量程度，通常以攝氏度或華氏度表示。
definition.en_def: Temperature is a measure of the degree of heat present in a substance or environment, typically measured in degrees Celsius or Fahrenheit.
definition.example: The temperature today is much warmer than it was yesterday.
